import React from "react" import { ThemeContext } from "../App" function Header() { const { darkMode, toggleTheme } = React.useContext(ThemeContext) const [isScrolled, setIsScrolled] = React.useState(false) React.useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setIsScrolled(window.scrollY > 50) } window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll) return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll) }, []) return (
Diarrassouba Hassan E.

) } export default Header
